title: Lost my Lee Sin skin????
body:
So, some time ago I'm 99% sure that I bought Pool Party Lee Sin, I also bought Acolyte Lee Sin, and used that instead, but a day ago or something I went to use it, but noticed I didn't have it anymore. Weird right? I'd have to dig through some files in lolrecorder to find it, but I'll get a picture of me with the skin, or the file itself. It will take a bit to find, but I'm not sure why I no longer have it.
Help?
Edit:
I couldn't find anything in my files, is there anything to go far back and track your purchase history from a while ago to prove you bought it?

replies.body: You can look in the store at purchase history/refunds page to see skins purchased and gifted.
It doesn't go back far enough
Is this happening in the Beta Client or the Legacy Client? Can you try using the other client and see if this still happens?
Legacy Client, I will try using the Beta Client and see if it still is missing
